changeSet.comment: UAF-4955 - 3.0 Enroute/Final PCDO Documents Cannot Be Searched by Credit Card Last 4 and Group Name In 6.0
changeSet.sql: UPDATE KREW_DOC_HDR_EXT_T SET KEY_CD = 'creditCardLastFour' WHERE KEY_CD = 'cardApprovalOfficial'; UPDATE KREW_DOC_HDR_EXT_T SET KEY_CD = 'name' WHERE KEY_CD = 'groupName';
